actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on National Parks and Public Lands.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on National Parks and Public Lands

official_title: To provide that any visitor's center or museum located in the proximity of or within the boundaries of Gettysburg National Military Park that is constructed or designated as a visitor's center or museum after the date of the enactment of this Act shall be known and designated as the "George D. and Emily G. Rosensteel Memorial Visitors' Center".

summary.text: Designates any visitor's center or museum for Gettysburg National Military Park constructed or designated after this Act's enactment as the George D. and Emily G. Rosensteel Memorial Visitors' Center.

titles.title: To provide that any visitor's center or museum located in the proximity of or within the boundaries of Gettysburg National Military Park that is constructed or designated as a visitor's center or museum after the date of the enactment of this Act shall be known and designated as the "George D. and Emily G. Rosensteel Memorial Visitors' Center".
